complain.title: Submit Complaint
complain.description: Submit a complaint about full, broken, or missing trash cans.

operator.title: Operator Login
operator.description: Operators can log in to view complaints and resolutions.

language.title: Change Language
language.description: Select the language you want to use for the application.

dashboard.title: Welcome to the trash reporting center.
dashboard.description: Please select the menu provided below to report a rubbish bin, or view trash report history.

tempat-sampah.title: Select trash bin
tempat-sampah.search-input: Enter the name of the trash bin
tempat-sampah.no-results: No trash cans found for the search term

error.title: Operator Login
error.description: Invalid username or password, please try again.
